title: Keywords in concordance windows, Solr Wrapper for LUCENE-5318
description:
This is a simple RequestHandler wrapper around ConcordanceCooccurSearcher submitted in LUCENE-5318.  It reanalyzes the concordance windows and ranks keywords wrt the target value of the concordance search.  

Does have some minimal support for SolrCloud, including distributed tf*idf.

**Following Yonik's Law** 
This is patch is more of a placeholder for a much more polished draft.  Among other things, test scripts and javadocs are forthcoming!
